title: Pecah 2013 480p DVDrip [302Mb]
description:
CIMB Bank Shah Alam is broken into, with Herman, Alan, Radi and Don getting away with the money. However, Alan is shot by the bank manager and taken to the hospital. In Seri Memori Home, Bakar, one of the elderly inhabitants, collapses suddenly, unconscious. Lidya, a nurse, and Dr. Vivian rushes to help and takes him to the hospital. At the Tengku Ampuan Rahimah hospital, all of their fates become entangled, especially Herman and Lidya, who are a couple. With Inspector Paul closing in on them and their getaway vehicle stuck, Herman, Don and Radi need to find a way to escape.
